com.mlt.desktop.graphic

Class Drawing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.graphic.Drawing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CubicCurve, Line, Outline, Path, Rectangle, Text

    public abstract class Drawing
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic drawing to use with the graphics context. A drawing has to implement a unique method to get its shape.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
